roleset.name: be left behind
roleset.note: REMAIN-V NOTES: Based on big corpus, comparison with 'leave'. Member of Vncls exist-47.1-1. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from remain.01-v)
REMAINING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to remain.01. Remain.01 is a member of VN class exist-47.1-1. Framed by Katie. (from remaining.01-n)

role.descr: benefactive, entity who gets the remainder

example.name: With PP
example.text: Exports will remain under a government target.

example.name: remain on
example.text: Five countries will remain on the so-called priority watch list
example.arg: on the so-called priority watch list

example.name: With AdjP
example.text: Their influence will remain subordinate to Japan's.

example.name: With NP
example.text: The US remains the leading trade partner for all of Asia.
example.arg: the leading trade partner for all of Asia

example.name: With VP
example.text: It remains to the President to administer the final infamy.

example.name: remaining arg1
example.text: The remaining of the mucosa in the ascending colon and cecum
example.arg: in the ascending colon and cecum
